title: TradeDay Check website
description: TradeDay is based in the United States and was established in January 2020. The firm operates in futures markets and offers a 1 Step program. Supported trading platforms include Tradovate, TradingView, Quantower, and NinjaTrader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Gap Trading: Benefiting from isolated/stray fills in gapped/illiquid markets prohibited.
Hedging: Long in one account and short in another on same product prohibited.
Microtrading during the first 5 days is not allowed.

payout_policy.details: Buffer zone must be cleared (Trailing Max Drawdown moved to opening balance). Profit split: 80% on first $50k, 90% up to $100k, 95% beyond. Buffer zone funds available at 50% split.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed from personal accounts elsewhere into TradeDay.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Allowed, but third-party algos/bots forbidden. No high-frequency scalping (>200 trades/day).
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: Accounts inactive for 45 days are closed.
firm_rules.news_trading: Restricted 2 mins before/after data release (no positions/orders).
forbidden_strategies: Gap Trading: Benefiting from isolated/stray fills in gapped/illiquid markets prohibited.
Hedging: Long in one account and short in another on same product prohibited.
Microtrading during the first 5 days is not allowed.

seo_content:
TradeDay Technical Infrastructure

TradeDay is based in the United States and was established in January 2020. The firm operates in futures markets and offers a 1 Step program. Supported trading platforms include Tradovate, TradingView, Quantower, and NinjaTrader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: TradeDay Full Report: Leverage, Rules & Payouts
youtube_metadata.description: Complete technical breakdown of TradeDay. We analyze their forex environment and execution rules.
